member.name: TRANSACTION_NOTIFICATION
member.summary: Contains the data that is associated with a transaction notification.

member.name: TRANSACTION_NOTIFICATION.TransactionKey
member.summary: The user-defined, opaque ID for this transaction.

member.name: TRANSACTION_NOTIFICATION.TransactionNotification
member.summary: The NOTIFICATION_MASK value for this transaction.

member.name: TRANSACTION_NOTIFICATION.TmVirtualClock
member.summary: The latest virtual clock value that is associated with this transaction. See.

member.name: TRANSACTION_NOTIFICATION.ArgumentLength
member.summary: Indicates the number of bytes for thestructure that follow thisTRANSACTION_NOTIFICATION structure.
